summary.span: 将 Win32 window 托管为 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 内容中的一个元素。

span.span: Hosts a Win32 window as an element within Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要承载 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] 窗口，请创建一个派生自的类 。To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window, create a class that derives from . 重写 方法，并将 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] 窗口创建为传入方法的父窗口的子级。Override the method and create your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] window as a child of the parent window that is passed into the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 尽管 派生自 ，但中的各种属性（ 例如）和其他中间类（如） 通常不映射到可能的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] 等效项。Although derives from , various properties of that come from and other intermediate classes such as are not generally mapped to possible [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] equivalents. 此外，并非所有 / 输入事件都是跨互操作边界传输的。Also, not all / input events transfer across the interoperation boundary. 从主要派生， 以便 可以将实例插入到最广泛的可能内容模型中，以便 可以应用默认布局特征。 derives from primarily so that an instance can be inserted into the widest variety of possible content models, and so that default layout characteristics can apply. 有关的更多详细信息 ，请参阅 [WPF 和 Win32 互操作](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation)。For more details on , see [WPF and Win32 Interoperation](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-and-win32-interoperation).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的实现是从的内部实现中调用的 。This method's implementation is called from within the internal implementation of . 只有在窗口由调用线程所有时，才会创建子窗口。The child window will be created only if the window is owned by the calling thread.

para.span: 重写此方法以生成所承载的窗口。

span.span: Override this method to build the window being hosted.

para.span: 返回的窗口必须是指定的窗口的子级 。

span.span: The window that you return must be a child of the window specified by .

para.span: 此外，仅当窗口由调用线程所有时，才会创建子窗口。

span.span: In addition, the child window will only be created if the window is owned by the calling thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型或成员在 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone. > > 可以重写此方法，但不能重写此签名。This method can be overridden, but not by this signature. 有关可重写签名，请参阅。See for the overridable signature. 此无参数签名是接口协定所需的签名，它将有效地调用活动 实现 `disposing` `true` 。This parameterless signature is the one required by the interface contract, and it effectively calls the active implementation with `disposing` being `true`.

summary.span: 立即释放该对象可能持有的任何系统资源。

span.span: Immediately frees any system resources that the object might hold.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型或成员在 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone. 如果派生类需要执行其他清理操作，则可以重写此方法。Derived classes can override this method if they need to do additional cleanup. 但是，它们还应调用基实现以确保释放所有资源。However, they should also call the base implementation to ensure that all resources are freed. 基本实现执行相当大的工作来释放基类已知的资源。The base implementation does fairly substantial work to free resources that are known to the base class. 如果承载窗口，它将被销毁。If a window is being hosted, it will be destroyed. 调用线程必须与调度程序相同。The calling thread must be the same as the dispatcher.

summary.span: 按照布局引擎操作的要求，返回 对象所表示的窗口的大小。

span.span: Returns the size of the window represented by the object, as requested by layout engine operations.
The size of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型或成员在 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone.

para.span: 在中 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] ，窗口应为创建窗口时布局请求的大小。

span.span: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)], a window is expected to be the size requested by layout at the time the window is created.

para.span: 派生类只应重写此方法，前提是它们具有有关所需窗口大小的附加信息。

span.span: Derived classes should override this method only if they have additional information regarding required window size.

para.span: 此处的特定实现已经是虚拟成员的替代 ，该虚拟成员基于窗口句柄的大小约束，并将一个或多个维度中的零值视为非约束。

span.span: The specific implementation here is already an override of the virtual member, which bases size constraints on the window handle and treats a zero value in one or more dimensions as a non-constraint.

para.span: 类还会重写一个 实现，该实现将导致窗体的剪辑过大。

span.span: The class also overrides a implementation that will result in a clip of the form if it is too large.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型或成员在 Internet 安全区域中不可用。This type or member is not available in the Internet security zone. > > 这是类处理程序的替代， 提供将消息转换为事件的行为，并在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 适当时将事件标记为已处理。This is an override of the class handler and provides the behavior of translating the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] message into a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] event, marking the event as handled whenever appropriate.
